about.description: `bitmath` simplifies many facets of interacting with file sizes in various units. Originally focusing on file size unit conversion, functionality now includes
about.summary: Pythonic module for representing and manipulating file sizes with different prefix notations (file size unit conversion)

about.description: `bitmath` simplifies many facets of interacting with file sizes in various units. Originally focusing on file size unit conversion, functionality now includes
about.summary: Pythonic module for representing and manipulating file sizes with different prefix notations (file size unit conversion)

name: bitmath
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "bitmath" %}
{% set version = "1.3.3.1" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/bitmath-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 293325f01e65defe966853111df11d39215eb705a967cb115851da8c4cfa3eb8

build:
  entry_points:
    - bitmath = bitmath:cli_script
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=3

test:
  imports:
    - bitmath
  commands:
    - pip check
    - bitmath --help
  requires:
    - pip

about:
  home: https://github.com/tbielawa/bitmath
  summary: Pythonic module for representing and manipulating file sizes with different prefix notations (file size unit conversion)
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  doc_url: http://bitmath.readthedocs.org/
  dev_url: https://github.com/tbielawa/bitmath
  description: |
    `bitmath` simplifies many facets of interacting with file sizes in various units. Originally focusing on file size unit conversion, functionality now includes

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - HeavyTony2
